item.description:
Redbones has been described as a place with great beer, good food, great atmosphere and...did we mention great beer?  The menu features downhome-style southern food such as BBQ ribs, pulled pork, chicken, and wings not to mention delicious, stick-to-your-ribs comfort food sides like mac & cheese and garlic mashed potatoes. 

We'll gather and chow.  Following dinner, if you're interested in a good laugh, please join your fellow Jumbos at the Somerville theater for the Laugh Your Tail Off Meet-up (RSVP separately.)
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the bald dude possibly wearing a Meet-up name tag.
item.why: Eat some ribs, before you tickle your ribs.
item.name: Jumbo Dinner: Redbones
